level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among the states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-292
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following § 19-501.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 8 of the Uniform Simultaneous Death Act (1993 Act).
